channel.title: Magnetometer on MSC/MSMCS Robotics
channel.description: Recent content in Magnetometer on MSC/MSMCS Robotics

item.title: Cosmic Glimpse
item.description:
Measuring changes in the Earth’s magnetic field. Possibly to be further developed as a more complete weather station.

Project Github Link

If the hyperlink does not work:

https://github.com/msmcs-robotics/CosmicGlimpse

item.title: Gravity Probe
item.description:
Verifying Newton’s theory of universal gravitation as part of the 2025 NASA RockSat-C program.

Project Github Link

If the hyperlink does not work:

https://github.com/msmcs-robotics/GravityProbe
